title: Windowed Mode FPS Issue
body:
Ever since 7.1 or 7.2 dropped, I have been experiencing an issue with my fps on windowed mode. Currently the only solution is to switch from windowed mode to full screen and back to windowed mode. This only happens on my computer's first boot, and all subsequent games are fine. It's more so a nuisance than anything else. I highly doubt it's a hardware issue. I use the DP cable that came with the monitor and have my monitor overclocked to 100 fps.

My setup:
CPU: Intel 4690k
Ram: 16GB 2133hz
GPU: Zotac Geforce 1080 AMP!
Monitor: Acer Predator x34

Windowed mode lagged only occurs with this game, and only recently has it been acting like this.

Anyone else experience this issue?

replies.body:
For a long time, overclocks of various types have caused issues with League. Can you try *temporarily* undoing your Monitor overclock to see if your issue changes at all?

Let me know, thanks!
